title: Start
body:
OCTOBER 24th
[[ Wake up |wakeup ]] |]]

title: wakeup
body:
[color=#ff00ff]3:00 am [/color]
‚ÄúReally?.. I can‚Äôt even sleep on my birthday‚Äù[color=#ffffff][/color]
[[ try to go back to sleep |Rollinbed ]] |]]
[[ Ramble |Ramble]] |]]
[[ Maybe I should turn the light on|Lighton ]] |]]

title: Rollinbed
body:
"An hour rolling on the bed and I still can‚Äôt go back to sleep"
[[ Ramble |Ramble ]] |]]
[[Give up |Lighton ]] |]]

title: Ramble
body:
"And that why chickens can‚Äôt fly"
[[ Try to go back to sleep|Rollinbed ]] |]]
[[Ramble | Ramble1]] |]]
[[Turn on the light|Lighton ]] |]]

title: Lighton
body:
"The only thing that i can do this late without waking anyone up is play some games"
[[ Maybe Tommy is awake,maybe we could play together |TextTommy ]] |]]
[[ I should close the door|DoorClosed ]] |]]
[[ I don't feel like playing with anyone|Playalone ]] |]]

title: Ramble1
body:
"I shouldn‚Äôt have said that 3 years ago, that was so embarrassing"üò≥
[[Ramble | Ramble2]] |]]
[[Turn on the light|Lighton ]] |]]

title: Ramble2
body:
"What if I get trapped on a lift and it falls down?" *heavy breaths*
"If I keep doing this I‚Äôll have a panic attack" 

[[Turn on the light|Lighton ]] |]]

title: TextTommy
body:
"Cool"
[[ I should connect now|Playwithfriend ]] |]]
[[ I should close the door before |DoorClosed ]] |]]

title: DoorClosed
body:
"Awesome,now I can Play without waking people up"
[[ HARDCORE PLAYING LOL MUCH FUN|Nextday ]] |]]

title: Playalone
body:
This is nice, so peaceful and quietüôÇ
[[ Wow,look at the time! |Nextday ]] |]]

title: Playwithfriend
body:
*laughs* 
MOM:"Why are you awake this late?"
 -"I couldn‚Äôt sleep, So ..I just thought it would be okay to just be in the computer until I was time to have breakfast" 
MOM:"Try to have some more sleep, people are coming to see you later."
 "-I tried, but I couldn‚Äôt" 
 MOM:"Just try again" *walks out*
[[ Ooops ahaha,I'll just keep playing quietly|PlayQuiet]] |]]

title: PlayQuiet
body:
"Damn it I should have closed the door"
[[ Hopefully by the morning she won't be mad |Nextday ]] |]]

title: Nextday
body:
9:00 am
MOM:" we should get going, I have a lot of things to do before your party."
-"Who‚Äôs even coming?"
MOM: "Everyone, your cousins, uncles and aunties, your grandparents and their relatives, my friends, and I invited 3 other couples that are friends of our friends so they can meet you as well."
*Why are we celebrating? There‚Äôs no reason to do this entire show, I don‚Äôt want all of this strangers in my house‚Ä¶ I don‚Äôt even want my family here, none of them have ever put any interest on who I am.
F*ck, why we couldn‚Äôt have a nice relaxing afternoon just the 6 of us? Why inviting people that literally don‚Äôt know who I am?
I don‚Äôt want to deal with‚Ä¶them‚Ä¶. Just thinking about having to say hi to them It makes me want to throw up, and I haven‚Äôt even seen them*

MOM: "..We are going to have a great time, I hope you get out of your room, you should share with the family, I don‚Äôt want anything to go wrong today, everything will be perfect."

[[ next |next ]] |]]

title: next
body:
*We bought all the groceries for the evening, I couldn‚Äôt stop thinking about how to avoid having to interact with everyone, especially THEM. But I couldn‚Äôt tell my mom that I didn‚Äôt want to do anything, she has been planning this party the whole month,even though she didn‚Äôt ask me if I wanted to do something I feel if I don‚Äôt accept her decision it would be disrespectful and that I‚Äôm not grateful for the effort that she‚Äôs putting into making me happy.
I tried to tell her that I would rather do something small but she ended up inviting an absurd amount of people*
[[Let's get this party started|Party ]] |]]

title: Party
body:
*I usually talk a lot with my nanny, I would say she knows me better than my own mom,at least she respects and maybe understand my point of view, we  have a really good relationship ; I love my mom , don‚Äôt get me wrong, but sometimes she just don‚Äôt listen to me,is like talking to a wall*
üîîDoorbell Ringsüîî
MOM: "Honey!, people are arriving, go and open the door, invite them in."
[[ Open door|open ]] |]]

title: open
body:
*People started arriving, ‚ÄúI need to relax, nothing is going to happen,THEY probably won‚Äôt even show up‚Äù I kept saying that on my mind to try to have a good time*
"Do you want something to drink?I think I‚Äôll go and grab something quickly"
Before I could even stand up from the table the doorbell rang
Cold sweat runs trough my back,I'm starting to panic.
[[ answer door |next1 ]] |]]

title: next1
body:
"Yes?"
*They arrived, why,why,why,why,why‚Ä¶..*
MOM:"Open the door please"
*I don‚Äôt even want to look at them*
[[ Open |Open ]] |]]

title: Open
body:
THEM:"HEEEYYY, Happy birthday, aren‚Äôt you happy to see us?"
*yeah, I‚Äôm going to need a big glass of rum*
[[ Hi thanks for coming , come in , grab something to eat :) |pretend ]] |]]
[[ Hi|pretend ]] |]]
[[:)|pretend ]] |]]

title: pretend
body:
*Pretend that everything is fine,speak with anyone but THEM, just avoid THEM*
Aunt Q:" How‚Äòs school going?"
[[Fine |question2 ]] |]]
[[Great*DRINK*|question2a ]] |]]
[[I think someone is calling me, brb|go to ]] |]]

title: question2
body:
"Fine I guess, I‚Äôm not really into it , i much rather‚Ä¶*gets interrupted*"
Aunt Q:" Oh! I‚Äôm so glad to hear that, is you boyfriend here?"
[[ Emm‚Ä¶ I don‚Äôt have a boyfriend|question3 ]] |]]
[[ DRINK |question3a ]] |]]
[[ I think someone is calling me, brb|go to ]] |]]

title: question2a
body:
"Great"
Aunt Q:" Oh! I‚Äôm so glad to hear that, is you boyfriend here?"
[[IGNORE AND DRINK |question3a ]] |]]
[[IGNORE AND DRINK |question3a ]] |]]
[[ I think someone is calling me, brb|go to ]] |]]

title: go to
body:
*Where should I go?*
[[ Go to room |ROOM ]] |]]
[[ Go to kitchen |Kitchen ]] |]]

title: question3
body:
Aunt Q:"When are you going to bring someone home ?"
[[ I'm not really into anyone at the moment,I have to go now|go to ]] |]]
[[IGNORE AND DRINK |question3a ]] |]]
[[ I think someone is calling me, brb|go to ]] |]]

title: question3a
body:
Aunt Q:"White noise ...?"
*I know she's asking something, but I really don't care,I'm feeling a bit weird*
[[ DRINK |Pass out ]] |]]
[[ DRINK |Pass out ]] |]]
[[ DRINK |Pass out ]] |]]

title: Pass out
body: Happy birthday

title: ROOM
body:
*I'm so tired, I need a minute to recover some energy, maybe I can rest in my room for 10 minutes*
I walked into my room, I'm laying on top of my bed.
*This is so nice,I really needed this*
MOM:"Honey!?,what are you doing? people are waiting for you, get out of your room"
"Okay,I'm on my way"
[[Okay,I'm on my way|Kitchen ]] |]]

title: Kitchen
body:
Nanny: hey, how are you? Are you enjoying the party?
[[ Yes, is great, maybe we should bring the cake out | A]] |]]
[[ Not really| B]] |]]
[[ I feel a bit sick *wink wink* , can you do me a favor? |C ]] |]]

title: A
body:
Nanny:"No problem!, Give me a minute."
[[ go to the living room |A2 ]] |]]

title: C
body:
Nanny:*wink back*"Sure Honey, what can I do for you?"
"Can you bring the cake out? , I just wanna be in my room until everyone is gone."
Nanny:"Sure, do you want me to bring you something after that?"
[[ YES please,Can you bring me some food?, just knock on the door and I will open| yes]] |]]
[[  Just a glass of fizzy would be nice, I can grab something to eat on the way.|fizzy ]] |]]
[[ No it‚Äôs fine|End3 ]] |]]

title: B
body:
"I actually wanted to spend this day alone, you know I like to have my space and being around people that I feel comfortable with.
I feel very invaded now, i don‚Äôt know more than half of the people here. 
I don‚Äôt want to fight with my mom , she doesn‚Äôt deserve that.
*to be honest she doesn‚Äôt deserve to have me her child*"
Nanny:"Oh Honey!that sucks, you know what we could do?, I will bring the cake out and after that you can come here and hang out with me until everyone is gone."
[[ Sounds nice, thank you|End2 ]] |]]

title: End2
body:
After we sang Happy birthday , I actually had a nice chat with my nanny.
*I feel much safer now that I don't have to share with THEM, I can breathe normally, even if they come around, my nanny can make anyone go away from the kitchen* 
 It made me feel a lot better, even though every 5 minutes someone came around to tell me that I was being disrespectful by not being with ‚Äúmy guests‚Äù.
[[ Thanks |Pass out ]] |]]

title: A2
body:
While people sing happy birthday
*I have only one wish, I just want to forget everything* 
[[ Blow your canddles |End3 ]] |]]

title: End3
body:
After eating a piece of the cake I sneak a bottle of rum into my room and locked the door .
I drank until I stopped feeling,I couldn‚Äôt recognize myself in the mirror, I felt like a stranger in my own body, but I stopped caring.

[[ Deep inside I wished that I would stop existing|Pass out ]] |]]

title: yes
body:
After singing I told my family that I wasn‚Äôt feeling great so I was going to stay in my room, my mom a bit worried asked me if everything was okay, I told her that it was nothing, just a headache, she gave me a paracetamol; Once in my room, I threw the pill away, turned on the computer and ate,I ate until I drowned the sadness and anger away, after that i just wanted to throw up, I was embarrassed of how much I ate, but I rather that than the disgusting sensation that I felt looking at the people that hurt me. 
[[At least now I was safe in my room, with food that made me feel better. |Pass out ]] |]]

title: fizzy
body:
I was ready to leave to my room, I told everyone that I wasn‚Äôt feeling alright, I grabbed a plate and I made myself a sandwich, I also grabbed a piece of cake and some chips; I was about to leave when I hear my grandfather yell at me
‚ÄúTHAT‚ÄôS WHY YOU LOOK LIKE A WHALE‚Äù
 [[ I said nothing and slammed the door behind me, I spend the rest of my birthday crying until I passed out.|Pass out ]] |]]
